content: Can someone point me to a URL with CESM LENS license (Presuming this exists somewhere on the web)?
In the last section of the landing page (https://doi.org/10.26024/wt24-5j82) we indicate that CC-BY-4.0 license applies, and we link to UCAR terms of use (https://www.ucar.edu/terms-of-use/data)

It's not clear if the CC-BY-4.0 license statement is specific to the output on AWS. The closest I find to a formal license for LENS on NCAR pages, with a quick search, is the statement "Data from the project are publicly available to any scientist who is interested" from the website "http://www.cesm.ucar.edu/projects/community-projects/LENS/data-sets.html".
